column4: is this the best compression method or is there better like I want to compress as good as possible tar cfzv mybins.tar.gz
bzip2 generally compresses better than gzip, but it takes longer.  xz is usually better than both, but it takes even longer (and it's not as common as gzip or bzip2).
Right, then "man xz" and look for the -0 ... -9 section.
However, it can use pretty obscene amounts of memory, so you may not want maximum compression if the compression takes longer than the upload.
